Instruction: Mix together chili powder, thyme, smoked paprika, oregano, cayenne pepper, cumin, onion powder, and salt in a bowl.
Sauté onion in melted butter in a large skillet over medium heat until translucent; then add garlic and cook until soft. Stir in shredded cabbage and cook until cabbage starts to soften.
Mix in the spices with the cabbage mixture until well combined and continue cooking, stirring regularly, until the cabbage is tender, about 3 minutes.
